description: Many worshippers are commemorating the baptism of Jesus by submerging themselves in icy water holes.
title: Orthodox Christians brave an icy dip to mark Epiphany
title_page: Orthodox Christians brave an icy dip to mark Epiphany - BBC News
maintext: To mark the event many Orthodox Christians submerge themselves in holes of icy water. They may dip themselves three times in the water to honour the Holy Trinity.
